title: Elderwood Bard unavailable?
body: So I recently bought Bard with IP but when I went to buy his skin, it said unavailable but still took the RP I used to buy it? At a later date do I receive the skin or a refund? Even in my purchase history it says that I bought it.

replies.body: Try logging out and then logging back in.  That may fix the issue.  If not, shoot Player Support an email, they should be able to help out.
